price: 85. (Allah) zei: “Waarlijk! Wij hebben jouw volk in jouw afwezigheid beproefd en As-Samiri heeft hen doen afdwalen.”
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
